title: [GAMEPLAY] Jhin's Q doesn't bounce to target if you auto the same target at the same time
body: If you q as Jhin, and you auto a minion the same time its going to bounce to that minion that you targeted, the q disappears. Usually happens if you q the first minion in a wave and go auto the 3rd minion. This is reproducible.

replies.body:
Heyo Lucid Poro! 

Thank you for the report! ^-^ We're aware of the issue and are working on resolving this.

Riot is aware of the bug and working on it~
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/jQYaup3c-gameplay-hn-jhin-q-bounce-only-twice?comment=0001
